text: @realDonaldTrump @senatemajldr @marcorubio @SenatorCollins @SteveDaines @SenThomTillis @SenCoryGardner My only wish as I look at that photo is that you'll all get the coronavirus and end up on ventilators. Big beautiful ventilators.
